name: DOGEBALL (chiploop, Blueman)
description:
You're at the park with your dog friend, when suddenly a few more dogs show up. Hopefully things don't get out of control :)

Note: There's a bug where it's possible for a tennis ball to hit you immediately after firing it. Once the GMTK game jam voting period ends we'll be able to upload the fixed version (along with other improvements and new content!).

Developed by Nathan https://blueman3612.itch.io

Art & Design by Ryan https://twitter.com/chiploop_

Music by Allen https://soundcloud.com/allenmeier
